Title: 9 Days
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Justin Noble, Lakshmi Sundaram (executive story editor), Phil Augusta Jackson (story editor), Tricia McAlpin (story editor), Justin Noble (story editor), David Phillips (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Peralta and Holt contract the Mumps while working on a cold case. Terry takes over the precinct in his place, but his ambitious plans ultimately fail. Boyle is sad over the death of his dog, but Diaz doesn't understand it.
